item.description:
UPDATE: So sorry to change details again, but Alex needs to go home for the week of the 17th due to a family emergency. We need to move the event to TUESDAY, JUNE 23, 2009. Please update your RSVP's accordingly.

UPDATE: Per Alex's request, the location has been changed to the Columbus Cafe... presumably to commemorate the spot of his very first meetup event. Please update your RSVP's accordingly!


**********************

Come July, our comrade Alex is bailing on Boston and moving to Texas to attend business school. Join us at his favorite restaurant as we mark his send-off with vino, macaroni and lots of good cheer.

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Arrivederci Alex! @ The Columbus Cafe, South End
